name: Farm Expert 2018 Premium
description:
The newest Farm Expert 2018 Premium includes over 20 unique agricultural machines and 4 open worlds, as well as over 50 hours of gameplay at the highest level of quality: driving the machines, managing the resources, a broad selection of agricultural activities.

You can plow, fertilize, harvest grain, breed cows, grow fruit orchards, buy and sell resources.

All of those features await in the most unique farm simulator that has ever appeared for mobile platforms.

Game features:

- Full options and worlds available
- No adverts
- Over 20 agricultural machines
- 4 game worlds
- Over 50 hours of gameplay
- Cow breeding, comprehensive field labor and fruit-growing
- A store to buy the necessary materials and machines
- and much more...
